title: What would be considered a good quality song? - Quora

response.answer_text: An audio interface. Just a quick note about sound. Good quality microphones – especially condensers – tend to pick up a lot of background noise. If your mixes are pretty sparse (i.e. your songs don't contain more than three or four tracks), it's best to record in quiet rooms; treated or otherwise.
Dreaming The World by R Carlos Nakai. https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=t2MkX-JjPzw
